YAML¶

New in version 2.0.0.

YAML is a common format for web data interchange.

Example:

first-name: "John"
last-name: "Smith"
age: 25
address:
    streetAddress: "21 2nd Street"
    city: "New York"
    state: "NY"
    postalCode: 10021
phoneNumbers:
    - home: "212 555-1234"
    - fax: "646 555-4567"
